title: Field Science Training Program for Astronauts

context.prior_knowledge: Basic earth science and scientific experimental methodologies
context.additional_context: Immersive learning content and discussion board operations via smartphone-based LMS

learning_goals: Learners can establish a data collection plan by applying three or more field science techniques in a virtual planetary environment.
Learners can simulate the scientific problem-solving process through collaboration with peer astronauts and document it in a report.
Learners can transfer scientific analysis skills acquired in a training environment to actual space mission scenarios with over 80% proficiency.

resources: Mobile-optimized virtual field science simulation platform
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
